Public Member Functions

 connect ()
 Connects to the database.

 Selects the desired database.
 close ()
 Closes the connection to the database.

 Prepares a query for execution.

 Executes a query.
 insert_id ()
 Returns the id generated by the last INSERT query.
 escape ($value)
 Escapes the given value to avoid SQL injections.
 result ($pos=0, $colname=NULL)
 Returns a single result of the last SELECT query.
 num_rows ()
 Returns the number of rows returned by a previous SELECT query.
 affected_rows ()
 Returns the number of rows affected by a previous INSERT, UPDATE or DELETE query.
 fetch_assoc ()
 Returns the current row of the resultset as an associative array.
 free_result ()
 Releases the result of the last query.
 print_query ()
 Prints the last query for debug.
